sentences.sContent: The returning bomber crews were debriefed.
sentences.sCn: 询问了返回的轰炸机机组人员以了解情况。

remMethod.val: de + brief(简述) → 听取报告

words.tran: 任务报告；任务报告中提出的情报

trans.tranOther: to ask someone questions about a job they have just done or an experience they have just had, in order to gather information
